Die letzten male die ich DbD gespielt habe waren so unbefriedingen weil die Killer einfach overpowered sind und immer mehr werden. Statt das balancing zu verbessern wird mehr dran gearbeitet wie man es schafft für nen Hut oder ne Hose n bisschen mehr Geld aus den Spielern zu quetschen.
Am Anfang war es cool und es hat Spaß gemacht zusammen gegen den Killer zu spielen oder der Killer zu sein. Mittlerweile braucht es kein campen vom Killer mehr um das Spielerlebnis als puren Frust zu empfinden es reicht wenn man einfach nur nach den unausgeglichenen und unfairen Mechaniken des Spiels spielt.
Nach jedem "Patch" schaut man mal rein mit der Hoffnung das was am Gameplay gebalanced wurde. stattdessen gibts einfach nur noch ne neue Ingame Währung und ne Maske für Killer xy den man sich natürlich extra kaufen muss.

Максимально ужасная игра в хорошем смысле, но есть и свои минусы:
1) Конч.руинеры.
2) Маньяки которые кемперят около крюков, когда повешали свою жертву, не давая шанса убежать. (Я так делал кста)
А вообще, рекомендую

played it on console and iv got a couple hundred hours on the game and played 24hours on pc and its a fun game once you get into it, all tho some games are toxic but that basically comes with any playerbase to a degree with most games.

Er.. this is awkward. Never thought I'd rate down the game that I'd profess was the love of my life. I've been playing it since 2016 and even saw them at PAX as they hit the steam store running. It urged me to opt in, even though I'd heard about them a little while before players had access. Guess I'll jump right to why I'm down voting..

- Newest killer, the "Trickster".. is a complete joke on varying levels. Not scary, brings no unique game play mechanics to the table, and just doesn't fit in with the theme. I'm definitely not the only one who feels this way. Majority of the player base did not ask for a Kpop theme; end of discussion. 

- Devs have stopped taking the game seriously. In some attempts to update the spook factor of the maps with overhauls, they turn around and release a killer that diminishes that. Add on to that how we have killers running around with giant rabbit suits, a floppy silly plush elephant head, and other such addons that really detract from the 'scare' value. Sure, they look cool, but the 'horror' elements are gone. 

- It feels like the company just reaches deeper and deeper in to your pockets with no care about actually catering to what the community and its supporters REALLY want. It's all a manipulation scheme. For the first time in over a year, I did not buy the rift pass since they released this new feature. Their rift rewards have turned to complete and utter garbage. 

- Let's talk about the player D/C penalty. Also, let's talk about how majority of games you face a killer that camps you to hell in back anymore, because there are a bunch of 9-14 year olds running around. Their discord server is FILLED with them, if you don't believe me. Use to be that you could get some games with like-adults, but not really the case anymore. 
So, you get penalized now for disconnecting because you don't want to waste your precious time (and it IS precious, because we don't live forever), dealing with crappy players or bad team mates that purposely are trying to get you killed. And, if  you try and kill yourself to get out, it backfires a lot of the time and is still nowhere near as fast as it would be to just be able to back out. Use to be that you'd lose bloodpoints if you left, but now you're forced to play bad games with bad players. Doesn't matter how much you've supported them (and I've given A LOT to this company in terms of $$$), they don't care about you or what you contributed. It DOESN'T MATTER how many surveys you fill out, in hopes of seeing this game that you adore, grow in to the best it can be. It will crap all over you in the end. Like it did myself and many others in my position. 

- No incentive to play anymore with all mentioned. No new game modes, no actual events for years now in terms of Halloween and Christmas, like they use to do the first couple of years. Use to be so much more interactive and decorative. We use to get christmas lights on lockers and hooks for the holidays, but they couldn't even do that the last two times, either! And, it doesn't seem like they plan to anymore. 

And, if you are wondering why I still play, the answer is I don't. I finally had enough an quit the other day, which.. frankly.. sucks. Because I love this game and it makes me horribly sad to be where I'm at now, leaving this review. Like.. WTF? How could it come to this? This was my game, my pal through hell or high water. 

I do NOT recommend. Sorry, but.. it's just not what it use to be.

This was one of those games I was very skeptical with as I walked in, telling my friends that I would only ever play it if it were with them, but oh I was wrong. This game hooked me (hah, get it..? no? moving on) with its game-play that never seems to be the same (or at least if you don't let it!). I have so much fun playing this with some of my best friends till 4 in the morning, or when I'm bored alone on a Thursday afternoon. You can constantly improve in so many areas which gives you that feeling of accomplishment almost every time you play. However, the game isn't all good, nor is any game for the fact. This game has a problem with matchmaking times, which yes, is for your sake (you do not want to go against a rank 1 as a rank 18!!) but it can take up a lot of your actual game time. There are also very weird hitboxes at times, where things will happen that you believe shouldn't have, but if you learn them correctly, they don't make much of an affect. Even with the flaws this game has, its amazing, and I enjoy playing it so much! Grab a group of friends and hop in, they make it oh so much better!
